mapper.select: select a.audit_id,v.vendor_name,a.audit_comp_date,a.audit_kind_Id,ak.audit_kind, a.audit_result,a.auditor_id,m.member_name from audit_info a, vendor_info v, audit_kind ak, member_info m where a.vendor_id=v.vendor_id and a.audit_kind_Id=ak.audit_kind_id and a.auditor_id=m.member_id and v.vendor_name like '%'||#{vendorName}||'%'
